How tall is Megaton in robot mode?

::Darkmouse::

Darkmouse growls, looking up at Megaton and showing no fear. "I'd 
watch yourself if I were you. These are my friends you're around."





--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Megaton grinned a fake smile as he still looked down at the 
others. "I'm
> glad to hear you're a bot of reason." he started walking toward the 
base,
> "Shall we go inside and discuss our options?" he asked knowing that 
he was
> now in control wether they knew it or not.
> 
> He caught Darkmouses look of disgust out of the corner of his eyes. 
Looking
> over, enlarging his mischivious smile he said "Don't worry little 
Darkmouse
> I'm not in the mood for a light snack right now."
